website_summaries.verdict: With leather that's soft out of the box, the break-in time for these sturdy shoes is nil.
pros: Fisherman-style sandal with a full-grain leather upper
Comes in cymball full grain leather, black full grain leather and brown distressed
leather and fabric lining, cushioned footbed, rubber outsole
cons: A bit heavy on the foot

customer_reviews.title: Best Sandal ever, make sure they send the right size.
customer_reviews.text: We just ordered these in a size 10 and when we got them the box said 10 but the sandals inside were a size 9. We are returning for the right size. These are my husbands favorite sandals. He says they are so comfortable for walking. Even thought the packaging was wrong in this order I still want to give these a great review because they are an amazing sandal. Hopefully this will help the packagers check to make sure the shoes inside the box match the box size.
customer_reviews.author: Blondie1

customer_reviews.title: Best Men's Sandals Available
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat a pair of Born sandals. It's the only brand my husband will wear. Hope they never stop making these because we will need a new pair in about 10 years. They are very well made and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: L. Gauvin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I wore these for ten hours the first day, i walk a lot of halls in n assisted living facility . These are dressy enough for work and comfortable enough for hikes. They are well made and I love the padded footbed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my husband, they fit to the size stayed. Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: After being worn in these shoes performed as I hoped. just took a bit to break them in.
customer_reviews.author: Bayliner51

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable sandals. I wear a 10 and these are tens and fit me perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great, comfortable, leather sandals. These are the second pair I've owned, and when they wear out I intend to buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: James Gegenheimer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: if you are going to wear sandals Born is the only way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Larry L. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Quite happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: Quite happy with the product. Too bad I will be closing my account with Amazon, because of a bad experience with Auto Ventshade.
customer_reviews.author: Jane C.

customer_reviews.title: One star for each year these lasted
customer_reviews.text: One star for each year these lasted, and I wear these a lot in North Texas. Probably nine months a year. The pair I have now I ordered on Amazon 4.5 years ago, and they would have lasted longer but I have had two puppies in that time who loved to chew on them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

product_meta.title: Born - Mens - Joshua
product_meta.description: Woven leather straps artfully showcase this handsome fisherman sandal.
